title: Drawing, "Scroll Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Pattern of stylized scroll motifs in yellow, green, red and white on a black background.

Drawing, "Scroll Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-11.
